text: Dani Anwar (22 February 1968 â€“ 3 August 2020) was an Indonesian PKS politician. He was a Senator from 2009 to 2014. He was also a member of the Jakarta Regional People's Representative Council from 2019 until his death. He was born in Jakarta. Anwar died on 3 August 2020 in Jakarta from COVID-19, aged 52. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Jakarta Category:Indonesian politicians
title: Dani Anwar
